channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Seriously degraded road surface, damaging vehicles, 10th April
item.description:
Between Noverton Lane and Three Sisters Lane, Roberts Road's surface is seriously degraded. I am aware of two vehicles (including my own) where tyre pressure sensors have broken due to this surface. Requires re-surfacing urgently please. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Roberts Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
At the end of Criftycraft lane

item.title: Flytipped wood/ furniture St Paul’s St North, 10th April
item.description:
Flytipped wood / flat pack furniture on pavement outside 40 St Paul’s St North. It’s been there for a couple of weeks now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Saint Pauls Street North, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Two way cycle path, 10th April
item.description:
The slope from CHeltenham Road to the underpass is on a blind corner plus overgrown at the exit - making things worse. As the cycle path gets busier there have been a couple of accidents and near misses as cyclists from Longlevens side descend (gather speed) and cut corner. While those exiting the underpass from Churchdown have a sharp blind bend. Simply needs a Keep Left warning both sides and a centre line please. Also can the undergrowth be maintained. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Milliner Crescent, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Entire rd, 10th April
item.description:
This entire rd has been a state for at least 5 years. Learner drivers have to drive down it before they start their test. Hardly surprising no one passes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain has dropped, 9th April
item.description:
The drain on the corner of this road where pointed out has dropped so pothole is the only reason I can give Car tyre drops down into it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Everest Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Surface is damaged causing a large lip at the end of the bridge, 9th April

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Hollis Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Completely overgrown and inaccessible gate to footpath, 9th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bentham Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road closed signs left on Croft Rd even though work is complete, 9th April
item.description:
Go Traffic Management "Road Closed" signs have been left up in several places along Croft Rd and diversions on other streets, even though the work looks to have been completed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Croft Road, Cheltenham
